title: UX Designer
tag: UX, UI, Design, User Experience, Local Government, Accessibility
benefits: Permanent full-time role with competitive salary and superannuation; Professional development opportunities; Inclusive and collaborative work environment
description: Design user-centred digital experiences that improve services for the community.
Translate research and user insights into practical, intuitive digital solutions.
Work collaboratively with service teams, IT, and vendors to enhance customer experiences.
Embed usability testing, journey mapping, and accessibility best practices into delivery.
